blogPosts.title: Film Commission Unveils Third Film Criticism Conference
blogPosts.author: Tejram Paswan
blogPosts.content:
The Film Commission

The Film Commission announced the launch of the third annual Film Criticism Conference and its accompanying events...

  • Aseer in August
  • Qatif in October
  • Riyadh in November

blogPosts.title: 2nd Edition of Riyadh Film Music Festival on July 28 at Princess Nourah University
blogPosts.author: Tejram Paswan
blogPosts.content: The Film Commission announced the launch of the third annual Film Criticism Conference and its accompanying events, held under the theme Cinema: the Art of Place. This year's conference will take place in three cultural hubs: Aseer in August, followed by Qatif in October, and concluding in Riyadh in November.
